q: Does this action 1) handle resource management 2) implement defensive exploration patterns 3) follow NetHack best practices?
description: Action block defining 'secure_chokepoint' function: 1) Search for traps (s) 2) Move west (h) 3) Throw dagger northeast (t + u) 4) Barricade door with boulder (E + 'push') 5) Rest for 5 turns (5 + '.'). Creates defensible position.
